fn.p: Abbreviations: CI = confidence interval, COVID-19 = coronavirus disease 2019, FEM = fixed effect model, MD = mean difference, PRISMA-P = Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analysis Protocol, QFPD = Qingfei Paidu Decoction, RCT = randomized controlled trial, REM = random effect model, RR = relative risk, SMD = standard mean difference.

How to cite this article: Zhang Y, Xie H, Li Y, Li T, Yuan H, Fu X, Xie C. Qingfei Paidu decoction for treating COVID-19: A protocol for a meta-analysis and systematic review of randomized controlled trials. Medicine. 2020;99:36(e22040).
HX, YL, TL, and ZY contributed equally to this work and are co-first authors.

This project is funded by the projects of Sichuan Provincial Science and technology department (No.2020YFS0012 and 2020YFS0013). The sponsors are not involved in design, execution, or writing the study.
Ethical approval is not needed for this study. The results of this study will be published in peer-reviewed journals.
The authors have no conflicts of interest to disclose.
The datasets generated during and/or analyzed during the current study are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.
